articles.description: In a video shared by Mumbai Indains on social media, Krunal said he feels his father's presence with him whenever he does well on the field.
articles.content: All-rounder Krunal Pandya is gearing up for the upcoming season of the Indian Premier League (IPL). He has been training with other teammates in Chennai as the defending champions gear up for the sea… [+2265 chars]
